表格客户车辆表的代码预览

drop table if exists clientcar;

/*==============================================================*/
/* Table: clientcar */
/*==============================================================*/
create table clientcar
(
cno varchar(20) not null,
clientno varchar(50),
ctsid int,
driver varchar(50),
driverphone varchar(20),
driverbirth date,
clicang int,
purchasetime date,
jctime date,
primary key (cno)
);

alter table clientcar add constraint FK_客户车辆品牌 foreign key (ctsid)
references cartypes (ctsid) on delete restrict on update restrict;

alter table clientcar add constraint FK_车辆与客户关系 foreign key (clientno)
references client (clientno) on delete restrict on update restrict;
